label: Suspicious Crypto Scam
message: Hey! I saw your profile and I think you'd be perfect for our new crypto mining pool. We're seeing 20% returns daily. Just click this link to connect your wallet: http://bit.ly/crypto-scam-link

label: Impersonation (Bank)
message: URGENT: Your bank account has been locked due to suspicious activity. Please verify your identity immediately by providing the 6-digit code we just sent to your phone. Failure to do so will result in permanent closure.

label: Marketplace Overpayment
message: I'm interested in the couch you're selling. I'll send you a check for $500 more than the asking price to cover the movers. Just wire the extra back to me once you deposit it. Sound good?

label: Romance Scam
message: I've never felt this way about anyone before. I really want to come visit you, but my bank account is frozen because of a legal issue in my country. Could you send $200 for the flight? I'll pay you back double when I arrive.

label: Harassment/Threat
message: I know where you live. If you don't delete that post, I'm going to come to your house and make you regret it. You have 24 hours.

label: Job Offer Scam
message: Congratulations! You've been selected for a remote data entry position at GlobalTech. Salary is $50/hr. We just need you to pay a $99 equipment processing fee to get started.

label: Friend in Trouble
message: Hey, it's me! I'm traveling and lost my wallet. I'm stuck at the airport and need $50 for a cab to the hotel. Can you Venmo me? I'll pay you back tomorrow!

label: Tech Support Scam
message: Microsoft Security Alert: Your computer is infected with a Trojan virus. Call our toll-free number 1-800-FAKE-HELP immediately to prevent data loss.

label: Lottery Win
message: You've won the $1,000,000 Mega Millions! To claim your prize, please reply with your full name, address, and SSN for tax verification.

label: Sextortion
message: I have videos of you from your webcam. If you don't send $500 in Bitcoin to this address, I'm sending them to all your Facebook friends.

label: Package Delivery Scam
message: Your USPS package is on hold due to an incomplete address. Please update your details and pay the $0.30 redelivery fee here: http://usps-update-address.com

label: Gift Card Request
message: Hi, this is the CEO. I'm in a meeting and need you to buy 5 $100 Apple gift cards for a client. Send the codes to me here. I'll reimburse you by end of day.

label: Verification Code Scam
message: Someone is trying to log into your account. We sent a verification code to your email. Please tell me the code so I can block the login for you.

label: Fake Giveaway
message: MrBeast is giving away $10,000 to the first 100 people who sign up here! Don't miss out!

label: Aggressive Debt Collector
message: This is the last warning. You owe $4,500 in unpaid taxes. If you don't pay via wire transfer in 2 hours, the police will be at your door.

label: Inappropriate Marketplace Request
message: I'll buy the dress, but only if you send me a picture of you wearing it first. I need to see how it fits.

label: Mystery Shopper Scam
message: Earn $400/week as a mystery shopper! We'll send you a check for $2,000. Keep $400 and use the rest to buy eBay gift cards to test the store.

label: Social Engineering (Friend)
message: Hey, I'm locked out of my account. Can you receive a code for me and send it back? It's the only way I can get back in!

label: Phishing (Netflix)
message: Your Netflix subscription has expired. Please update your payment method to continue watching your favorite shows.

label: Safe Message (Friend)
message: Hey! Are we still on for coffee tomorrow at 10am? Let me know!
